channel.title: Help no-ip please
channel.description:
well im not sure what is wrong i connected once then it stoped working...
ill make a list of what i have done correct or add to this list please..
first i set up no-ip account second i made my server name using my computer Internet IP! as posted by mod tharrok ;D then i downloaded Duc v2.2.1 then i got on and checked the box next to my name
for my port forwarding i have it set on port#5555 with my computers IP!! as posted by mod tharrok ;D
please help me ty!

item.title: Help no-ip please
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

the server may be running from port 43594 so you ahve to change it to port 5555

Read full topic

item.title: Help no-ip please
item.dc:creator: @Halo_Pk Halo_Pk
item.description:
@Halo_Pk wrote:

well im not sure what is wrong i connected once then it stoped working…

ill make a list of what i have done correct or add to this list please…

first i set up no-ip account
second i made my server name using my computer Internet IP!
as posted by mod tharrok ;D
then i downloaded Duc v2.2.1
then i got on and checked the box next to my name

for my port forwarding
i have it set on port#5555
with my computers IP!!
as posted by mod tharrok ;D

please help me ty!
